title: Rep. Mary Gay Scanlon Carjacked in Philadelphia
sub_head: Pennsylvania Democrat had just finished a meeting in FDR Park when she was held at gunpoint
body:
U.S. Rep. Mary Gay Scanlon was carjacked at gunpoint in Philadelphia on Wednesday as she walked to her car from a meeting, according to her office and law-enforcement officials.
The Pennsylvania Democrat wasnâ€™t physically harmed, her office said.
